Class ProjectResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.web.rest.ProjectResource

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class ProjectResource
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing Project.

      • createProject

        @PostMapping(value="/projects")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProjectDTO> createProject(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                 ProjectDTO projectDto)
                                                                                                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                 org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        POST /projects : Create a new project.
        Parameters:
        projectDto - the projectDto to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new projectDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the project has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • updateProject

        @PutMapping(value="/projects")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProjectDTO> updateProject(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                ProjectDTO projectDto)
                                                                                                         throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        PUT /projects : Updates an existing project.
        Parameters:
        projectDto - the projectDto to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated projectDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the projectDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the projectDto couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • getProject

        @GetMapping(value="/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed

        Returns:
